item.description: Google has been working hard on improving real time search. Bing, on the other hand, is trying to deliver more personalized search experiences. Yahoo! has spent some time on redesigning its search results pages to streamline the user’s search experience. Wow, what else? In the last couple of years, search has been rapidly changing. This evolution is both fascinating and educational because it gives marketers an idea of what they should focus on next. Join us for the panel "The Evolution of Search,” in which leading search marketing experts will discuss some of these changes and what they mean for us. Find out what search updates Google, Yahoo! and Bing have been releasing to improve their usability and attract more visitors. PLEASE REGISTER HERE: http://www.sempo.org/events/event_details.asp?id=182407#ixzz1Zl033K00
item.name: Join us at the SEMPO Boston Fall Event - The Evolution of Search
